title: New Client (PLEASE READ!)
body:
Hellllllo Rito.

I have a problem with the new client, as you might have noticed already. It is lagging terribly and I cannot play on it. Is anyone else having this problem, or is it just my computer? :3 Please reply soon. I want to get ganking! 

If any fellow summoners see this, please upvote so that Riot can see this. 

Thanks, Zielion ({{champion:429}} main)

P. S. Please release some information about the Kalista changes/rework!! <3

replies.body: The game itself hasn't changed, so the client shouldn't cause that to happen.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of the games this is happening in, which will give us an overview of what you're experiencing.  Let me know what you find!
Hi! I found that I could make it work by closing all my Chrome tabs. Thanks for replying!
